mapper.select: select nvl(to_char(m.measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),0) measure_time, to_number(to_char(avg(measure_value),'99999')) measure_value from measure_data m, iot_info i where m.iot_id=i.iot_id and m.iot_id='나의 공기측정1' and member_id='kimminsu' and m.matter_code='PM10' and to_char(m.measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') > to_char(sysdate-7,'yyyy-mm-dd') group by m.iot_id,i.member_id, to_char(m.measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by measure_time desc

select to_char(m.measure_time,'hh24') || ':00' measure_time, to_number(to_char(avg(measure_value),'99999.9')) measure_value from measure_data m, iot_info i where m.iot_id=i.iot_id and m.iot_id=#{iot_id} and member_id=#{member_id} and m.matter_code=#{matter_code} and to_char(m.measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{dayMatterData} group by m.iot_id,i.member_id, to_char(m.measure_time,'hh24') order by measure_time

select count(*) from ( select * from measure_data m, iot_info i where m.iot_id=i.iot_id and m.iot_id=#{iot_id} and member_id=#{member_id} and m.matter_code=#{matter_code} and to_char(m.measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') > to_char(sysdate-30,'yyyy-mm-dd') and measure_value>${badValue})

select nvl(to_char(avg(o.measure_value),'99999.9'),0) measure_value_avg from ( select to_char(m.measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') measure_time, to_number(to_char(avg(measure_value),'99999.9')) measure_value from measure_data m, iot_info i where m.iot_id=i.iot_id and m.iot_id=#{iot_id} and member_id=#{member_id} and m.matter_code=#{matter_code} and to_char(m.measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') > to_char(sysdate-30,'yyyy-mm-dd') group by m.iot_id,i.member_id, to_char(m.measure_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') order by measure_time desc) o

select o.measure_value from ( select * from measure_data m, iot_info i where m.iot_id=i.iot_id and m.iot_id=#{iot_id} and member_id=#{member_id} and m.matter_code=#{matter_code} order by m.measure_time desc) o where rownum=1
UPDATE COMPONENT SET ALARM_TIME= SYSTIMESTAMP WHERE IOT_ID=#{iot_id} AND MATTER_CODE=#{matter_code}
